data.expected_result: The typing indicator should show as it does when you type in the chat text field
data.short_description: Typing in the upload modal doesn't trigger a typing indicator in the chat or member list
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a server that you can send messages and attach files in - Select an image to upload into one of the channels and type a little message in the upload modal - Ask a friend to observe and tell you if a typing indicator is ever shown
